g.text: contains all the relevant information about the
grant. Providers can optionally prepare these
The notification also contains information about
the project itself. It contains information such as
However, the end-user has not yet performed any
type of connection. Thus the provider might choose
knowledge of the specifics in this step.
OIDC tokens are verified using the
RSA public key of the OIDC provider
At this point, the integration module may
also choose to perform initialization of
resources. This is beneficial since UID
of local users is now available.
One or more project updates pending
The integration module calculates its own diff.
This helps protect against missed events while
the provider is down (but UCloud isn't).
Each diff event is dispatches to one or more
for handling a concrete type of event.
